attributes.action: Keep the beat Police in the traditional Beat Duty Helmet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a movement to phase out the traditional Bobbies Helmet and we feel that the traditional British Bobbie has been altered and changed quite enough and that to remove the "Bobbies Helmet" from the High Street would make matters worse.
We understand that they are not always convenient to wear but they do have an important place when the 'Bobby' is on foot patrol or beat and should be maintained.
